document_data.name: Aevan Dragorovich
document_data.mainbody: '''Aevan Dragorovich''' was a [[Raumviran]] inhabitant of [[Drubiev]] in the [[Hordelands]] in [[1375 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Activities: Aevan was the First Councilman of the [[Council of Five (Drubiev)|Council of Five]] of Drubiev in 1375. Given Drubiev's rapid growth in the years following the collapse of the [[Grand Army of the Tuigan|Tuigan Horde]], Aeven spent much of his time and energy keeping the citizens of Drubiev in check. Many of the citizens favored expansion, while the more conservative folk were opposed to this idea.
